Name: Catch the Winds
Description: A strange Royan merchant arrives near the Relay Station, unusually warm and eager to involve you in an odd transaction…
QuestDesc: A strange Royan merchant arrives near the Relay Station, unusually warm and eager to involve you in an odd transaction…

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, that's right. Over here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, judging by your unusual clothing, you're from the south, aren't you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since you've come all this way to Lahai-Roi, why don't you sit back and browse through my goods? Maybe something'll catch your eye.

Options.PlotLineKey: I don't need anything right now.
Do you offer paint jobs for motorbikes?

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hah, you're an interesting one. You've got quite the eye for someone your age.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Everyone gets all sparkly-eyed in front of my items. But you're not even remotely interested.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I only sell genuine products. But as you know, not all the best stuff is found on the shelves.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Heh! What I'm trying to say is... You need the right source to get your hands on the right stuff.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: For someone new to town, you'll need a guide if you want to get things done here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's all about "getting acquainted" in our line of work.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've been in this racket a long time, so I know a few people. If you think you can trust me, I may be able to help you make some connections. I guarantee you'll get a good deal.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hah, you're an interesting one. You've got quite the eye for someone your age.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Everyone gets all sparkly-eyed in front of my items. But you're not even remotely interested.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I only sell genuine products. But as you know, not all the best stuff is found on the shelves.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Heh! What I'm trying to say is... You need the right source to get your hands on the right stuff.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: For someone that's new to town, you'll need a guide if you want to get things done here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's all about "getting acquainted" in our line of work.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've been in this racket a long time, so I know a few people. If you think you can trust me, I may be able to help you make some connections. I guarantee you'll get a good deal.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmph! You're quite a picky one, aren't ya? A paint job, eh? Well, I've got a few selections on me, but they're all just ordinary paint you see everywhere.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sure, you don't want anything on the special side?

Options.PlotLineKey: Sounds like you know where to get some.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You bet I do. I've been in the game long enough to know a few people. If you'll trust me, I may be able to help you make some connections. I guarantee you'll get a good deal.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But as you know, nothing comes for free...

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You scratch my back, I'll scratch yours.

Options.PlotLineKey: If you want money... then I'll have to think about it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sure thing, take all the time you need. You should always think twice when there's money involved.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (He's definitely not the run-of-the-mill merchant...)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (He sounded like he was sure that I'm new to Lahai-Roi... Almost like he's picking customers...)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Let's see if I can get a little more out of him.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You sure you can get me connected? Then how come I've never heard of you before? You're not making all this up, are you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, come on. Why would I waste my time on that?

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Believe me or not... The choice is yours.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just don't come crawling back to me, soaked in regret from your decision afterwards. There won't be another golden opportunity like this by then.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (He seems to be hiding something... He calls himself a merchant, but I'm certain he's into something shady.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I'll just have to play along if I want to get to the bottom of this.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How about I give you half the payment now, and we discuss the other half once this is all done?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We only just met, so having some insurance is good for both of us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Heh, you're pretty smart. All right, deal, we'll do it your way.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, you'd better keep that other half warm.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, suit yourself. Business is all about fate. Forcing it won't do either of us any good.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But one last piece of advice. If you ever change your mind, you'd better come find me quick.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Opportunities like this don't last forever.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brax
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Shoo! Go away! Can't you see I'm busy?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Brax
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? Want to take a look at my wares, you say? Tch, no sponsor, no looksie.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brax
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Bring me your sponsor. If you want to do business, I'll have to hear what your sponsor's gotta say first.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I have a sponsor, Sonam from the Relay Station.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We're meeting at ten in the morning tomorrow.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brax
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, him? Well, if Sonam said so, just show up with him tomorrow.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brax
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I expect you to be here on time. Just play by the rules and don't cause any trouble.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brax
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't play dumb with me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brax
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait a minute... You're not one of those spies, are you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You notice a chill in his voice, and even the air around you grows tense. Though his movements remain subtle, you instinctively sense the danger that is approaching.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Easy, I'm here to do business. No hard feelings.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So... I heard you have some high-quality goods...

Dialogues.Speaker: Brax
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmph! You've got a good eye.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's just that... Well, I'm new in town, so I haven't made any connections to get myself a sponsor yet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brax
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Connections? You're not getting anything out of me, you hear?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Relax. If I were a spy, why would I even put myself at such risk?

Dialogues.Speaker: Brax
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hah! You have a point. I doubt you'd dare to cause trouble.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brax
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: About your sponsor... Well, listen up, cause I won't say this again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brax
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Look for a guy called Sonam at the Relay Station. Get his approval, and we can do business.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Judging by his reaction, it's obvious there's something shady going on around this place.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (If this "sponsor" matters so much to them, then there must be more than meets the eye.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I should visit the Relay Station when I get the chance.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Brax
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't play dumb with me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brax
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait a minute... You're not one of those spies, are you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You notice a chill in his voice, and even the air around you grows tense. Though his movements remain subtle, you instinctively sense the danger that is approaching.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Easy, I'm here to do business. No hard feelings.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So... I heard you have some high-quality goods...

Dialogues.Speaker: Brax
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmph! You've got a good eye.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's just that... Well, I'm new in town, so I haven't made any connections to get myself a sponsor yet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brax
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Connections? You're not getting anything out of me, you hear?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Relax. If I were a spy, why would I even put myself at such risk?

Dialogues.Speaker: Brax
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hah! You have a point. I doubt you'd dare to cause trouble.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brax
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: About your sponsor... Well, listen up, cause I won't say this again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brax
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Look for a guy called Sonam at the Relay Station. Get his approval, and we can do business.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Judging by his reaction, it's obvious there's something shady going on around this place.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (If this "sponsor" matters so much to them, then there must be more than meets the eye.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I should visit the Relay Station when I get the chance.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Rokan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey! What are you doing here! Quick wandering around!

Options.PlotLineKey: I'm just having a look around.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rokan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Looking around? Heh... You don't dress like one of us. You came here to do business?

Dialogues.Speaker: Rokan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha! Well, you've come to the right place. We've got plenty of good stuff.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rokan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Especially...

Dialogues.Speaker: Rokan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Especially stuff you can't find or buy anywhere else.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rokan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course. We've got rare items, like... Uh, forget it. We don't talk about that.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (That's a strange answer. He's avoiding important details.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (All the more reason to get to the bottom of it.)

Options.PlotLineKey: That's right, I'm here to do business.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rokan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hah! You came at the right time. But... Where's your sponsor? We don't do business with just any random person.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rokan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, why would we trust you if you don't have a sponsor? You could be a spy for all I know.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I knew there was something off about this place...)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I have a sponsor, Sonam from the Relay Station. Does the name sound familiar to you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Rokan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tch, you managed to get him as your sponsor? You know your stuff, huh?

Dialogues.Speaker: Rokan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Word of advice... Sonam's a slippery bastard, better keep your eyes peeled if you wanna get something out of him.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rokan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All right, you can come back tomorrow. Things have gotten a little sketch lately, so we've gotta pick our days if you wanna do business.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rokan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But if you ask me, the boss is just being paranoid. This isn't our first rodeo, so what's the worst that could happen?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Easy, I heard the people here are well-connected, so I came over to see it for myself... But since I'm new here, maybe you could do me a favor and point me in the right direction?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When it comes to business, you can't turn down someone who's got cash ready in their hands now, can you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Rokan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tch... Fine, seeing you're an honest fella, I'll let you in on a secret.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rokan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Look for a merchant called Sonam at the Relay Station. We'll do business once he agrees to be your sponsor.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rokan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Entirely up to you to convince him.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, you're here mighty early. Looks like you're really eager to seal the deal.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The deal's not quite ready to go down yet, though. Have a breather.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, right. A bunch of people are coming, things could get real hectic, real quick, so keep your lips sealed and your head down. Don't cause trouble.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Some time later...

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Looks like it's about to go down. Remember what I said earlier...

Dialogues.Speaker: "Trader"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, listen up: You look at the goods, then make your offer. No backtracking.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Trader"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We'll start with the B-grade stuff...

Dialogues.Speaker: "Trader"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Two Spacetrek Collective Void Storm research reports, from a reliable source. Starting bid, fifty thousand.

Dialogues.Speaker: Buyer A
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tch. That's a lot of money for some lousy paper.

Dialogues.Speaker: Buyer B
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What would you know? Those are Spacetrek Collective internal documents. The kind of stuff credits can't buy.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (How would Spacetrek Collective research reports end up in a place like this?)

Dialogues.Speaker: "Trader"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Heh, a lot of new faces here. Sweet-talking won't get you anywhere if you want to do business on my turf.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Trader"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Cut the chit-chat. If you're paying, move the left. If you're browsing, move to the right. If you got no money, then beat it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Buyer A
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: C'mon, stop trying to screw us with the cheap stuff. We know you have the good stuff.

Dialogues.Speaker: Buyer C
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, do you know how much it cost me just to be here? If you've got anything good, bring it out now so we can see if it's worth the trouble.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Trader"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmph... You've got some nerve trying to get your hands on those "goods."

Dialogues.Speaker: "Trader"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Very well, let's see how you like this.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Trader"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Bring out the <ano=A-grade >"live ones</ano>."

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You see several Exoswarm being violently shoved toward the crowd, their metallic limbs dull and listless, their movements sluggish. The air is thick with the foul stench of cold metal and motor oil.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Trader"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There you have it. The latest and greatest of our stock.

Dialogues.Speaker: Buyer B
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why do they all look diseased? There's nothing wrong with them, is there...?

Dialogues.Speaker: "Trader"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We only got these. If you want livelier ones, come back with deeper pockets next time.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Trader"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe.... You think I don't know what's going on in your heads? If there's anything more valuable on Exoswarm, it's Exostrider parts.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Trader"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The "lively" ones will just get in the way.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Those Exoswarm...)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (No true Roya would ever harm Exoswarm. These people must be Outcasts in disguise.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I have to put a stop to this... These Exoswarm can still be saved, but it's up to me alone. These trades must be cut off at the source, or else they'll keep happening...)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I've gotta get the Spacetrek Collective involved... I need to find a way to leave so I can get the message out.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What's up? Why are you looking around like that? Not impressed with the goods?

Options.PlotLineKey: I was looking for the bathroom.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, no, no, this stuff's really impressive. It's just... Well, nature calls, you know? I drank some water on the way, and now I...

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Goodness sake.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just go. And make it quick.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, no, no, the stuff's really impressive. It's just... Ugh, my wallet! I must've dropped it somewhere...

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After all that I went through to be here... Uh... Hey, sponsor buddy, mind fronting me some credits? I'll pay you back later.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Goodness sake...

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do you remember where you might've lost it?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well... I was holding it in my hands earlier, but the next thing I knew, it was gone.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fine... Have a look around the camp, I guess...

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Remain silent and keep your eyes glued to the ground. Don't go poking your nose around.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't say I didn't warn you if you get into trouble.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (This seems like a safe spot.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I'll contact the Spacetrek Collective on the Terminal and explain everything.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These people really don't know when to quit.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If they want a fight, I'll give them a fight.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Meet me at the camp in Fangspire Chasm, near Sundermere, by ten in the morning tomorrow.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll show you around a bit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sonam
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Great opportunities also come with their share of risks. Just remember: No questions. Come alone.
